articles.title: India vs Australia T20 World Cup 2026 Playing XI Confirmed
articles.snippet: BCCI has officially confirmed the playing XI for India's opening match against Australia in the T20 World Cup 2026. Rohit Sharma will lead the side with Virat Kohli at number three.
articles.author: YoSinTV
